page.title: 06That's entertainment!
page.content: There are no theatres,cinemas,operas or the like in the district. To go to the cinema you have to go to Truro,Newquay or St.Austell and often, especially in the summer,they are showing the same film. The nearest real live theatre is the Theatre Royal at Plymouth,but Newquay has shows for the tourists in the summer. There is a pantomime put on in Indian Queens every year and lots of children from the school are involved.It is very good. There is a silver band who hold a week of activities in July every year.The highlight is the carnival. In October there is a Music Festival held in the local Victory Hall where all entrants are judged.
